meta_description.title: Day of the Tentacle - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Day of the Tentacle, also known as Maniac Mansion II: Day of the Tentacle, is a 1993 graphic adventure game developed and published by LucasArts.Genre(s): Graphic adventurePublisher(s): LucasArtsArtist(s): Peter ChanMode(s): Single-player‎Plot · ‎Development · ‎Reception · ‎Remasters

people_also_ask.question: How long does it take to beat Day of the Tentacle?
people_also_ask.heading: When focusing on the main objectives, Day of the Tentacle: Remastered is about 5 Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 6 Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: Day of the Tentacle: Remastered - HowLongToBeat.com

people_also_ask.question: What type of game is Day of the Tentacle?
people_also_ask.heading: cartoon puzzle adventure game
people_also_ask.heading2: Originally released by LucasArts in 1993 as a sequel to Ron Gilbert's ground breaking Maniac Mansion, Day of the Tentacle is a mind-bending, time travel, cartoon puzzle adventure game in which three unlikely friends work together to prevent an evil mutated purple tentacle from taking over the world!

knowledge_panel.description: day of the tentacle, also known as maniac mansion ii: day of the tentacle, is a 1993 graphic adventure game developed and published by lucasarts. it is the sequel to the 1987 game maniac mansion. wikipedia
